mapper.select: select spider_id,spider_back_id, spider_name, spider_Type,create_Type,spider_Des, spider_Link,spider_default_params_all,spider_default_params, status, create_time, remark from spider_spidermanage
select spider_back_id,status from spider_spider_list where spider_back_id=(select spider_back_id from spider_spidermanage where spider_id =#{spiderId})
select spider_back_id,status from spider_spidermanage where spider_back_id=(select spider_back_id from spider_spidertask where task_id =#{0})
select spider_back_id,status from spider_spider_list where spider_back_id=(select spider_back_id from spider_spidertask where task_id =#{taskId})
select spider_id,spider_back_id, spider_name,spider_type,status,create_Type,spider_default_params_all,spider_default_params from spider_spidermanage where spider_name=#{spiderName}
select spider_id,spider_back_id, spider_name,status, create_time from spider_spidermanage where spider_back_id=#{spiderBackId}
mapper.insert: insert into spider_spidermanage( spider_id, spider_back_id, spider_name, spider_Type, create_Type, spider_Des, spider_Link, spider_default_params_all, spider_default_params, status, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{spiderId}, #{spiderBackId}, #{spiderName}, #{spiderType}, #{createType}, #{spiderDes}, #{spiderLink}, #{spiderDefaultParamsAll}, #{spiderDefaultParams}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select spider_id,spider_back_id, spider_name, spider_Type,create_Type,spider_Des, spider_Link,spider_default_params_all,spider_default_params, status, create_time, remark from spider_spidermanage where spider_id = #{spiderId}
mapper.delete:
delete from spider_spidermanage where spider_id in
#{spiderId}
